award_title: SBIR Phase II: Mesospheric Sub-orbital Ballooning System
subject: Recognition for computational contributions
body:
Hi Pradeep,

Citations show who you've credited, but they don't show when your methods actually get used.

I built Ouroâ€”it's an API layer that lets researchers reuse computational workflows directly. When someone uses your approach, it's logged and visible.

For satellite testing simulations or flight data analysis, this could help your work get used (not just cited) and make that impact measurable.

Would you be open to a quick chat in the new year?

Happy holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
